RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Pattern split
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Fabio Napodano | It-Alien (it-alien@renoise.com)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
Splits the current pattern in two on the current row, including automation.
Creates a menu entry 'Split' in the 'Pattern Editor -> Pattern' context menu and adds an unassigned keyboard shortcut.
